Translations.Text: wa-udh'kur ʿabdana ayyuba idh nada rabbahu anni massaniya l-shaytanu binus'bin waʿadhabin
ur'kud birij'lika hadha mugh'tasalun baridun washarabun
wawahabna lahu ahlahu wamith'lahum maʿahum rahmatan minna wadhik'ra li-uli l-albabi
wakhudh biyadika digh'than fa-id'rib bihi wala tahnath inna wajadnahu sabiran niʿ'ma l-ʿabdu innahu awwabun
wa-udh'kur ʿibadana ib'rahima wa-is'haqa wayaʿquba uli l-aydi wal-absari
inna akhlasnahum bikhalisatin dhik'ra l-dari
wa-innahum ʿindana lamina l-mus'tafayna l-akhyari
wa-udh'kur is'maʿila wal-yasaʿa wadha l-kif'li wakullun mina l-akhyari
hadha dhik'run wa-inna lil'muttaqina lahus'na maabin
jannati ʿadnin mufattahatan lahumu l-abwabu
muttakiina fiha yadʿuna fiha bifakihatin kathiratin washarabin
waʿindahum qasiratu l-tarfi atrabun
hadha ma tuʿaduna liyawmi l-hisabi
inna hadha lariz'quna ma lahu min nafadin
hadha wa-inna lilttaghina lasharra maabin
jahannama yaslawnaha fabi'sa l-mihadu
hadha falyadhuquhu hamimun waghassaqun
waakharu min shaklihi azwajun
hadha fawjun muq'tahimun maʿakum la marhaban bihim innahum salu l-nari
qalu bal antum la marhaban bikum antum qaddamtumuhu lana fabi'sa l-qararu
qalu rabbana man qaddama lana hadha fazid'hu ʿadhaban diʿ'fan fi l-nari
waqalu ma lana la nara rijalan kunna naʿudduhum mina l-ashrari
attakhadhnahum sikh'riyyan am zaghat ʿanhumu l-absaru
inna dhalika lahaqqun takhasumu ahli l-nari
